attributes.additional_details: Erasmus+ is a unique and valuable cultural exchange, and there is no reason why Brexit means we should not participate in it. The proposed Turing Scheme is vague in its details and likely to be a pale imitation. For the sake of our future generations, this opportunity should not be denied to students and volunteers.
attributes.background: Leaving the Erasmus+ scheme is a huge mistake, and totally unnecessary. The government should reverse this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330917
